GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
regulator: qcom_rpm: Fix circular deferral regression

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 14c06375c8530d58c237fedd94c8f69feb1b5697, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit 087a1b5cdd555970feb8a340dc008b6914f05128. For more details please see the references link.
